# AUParameterEventType.parameterEvent_Ramped

**Case**

A gradual change from the parameter’s previous value to a new value, applied linearly over a specified period of time

## Declaration

```swift
case parameterEvent_Ramped
```

## Constants

- **AUParameterEventType.parameterEvent_Immediate**: An immediate change from the parameter’s previous value to a new value.

items.description: An immediate change from the parameter’s previous value to a new value.
